questions: My coworker keeps getting credit for my ideas in meetings. What should I do?
I found out my neighbor has been spreading rumors about me. How should I handle this?
Someone cut in front of me in line and was rude about it. What would you do?
My ex is dating someone new and posting about it constantly. Any advice?
A friend borrowed money and keeps avoiding paying me back. What should I say?
My roommate keeps eating my food without asking. How do I address this?
Someone left a bad review of my business that I think is unfair. What should I do?
My sibling always gets more attention from our parents. How do I deal with this?
A competitor is copying my work. What's the best approach?
Someone I trusted shared my secret. How should I respond?
